New_Brunswick.Sawmill Brook (New Jersey):
Sawmill Brook is a tributary of Lawrence Brook in northwestern East Brunswick, New Jersey in the United States.


== Course ==
The Sawmill Brook's official source is at 40°26′35″N 74°23′58″W. It runs through the industrialized section between Harts Lane and Route 18. It then crosses Harts Lane and runs through Tices Lane Park.
